capability.name: Product Broker Agreement
capability.definition: This service domain maintains product broker contractual and service level agreements and tracks and confirms compliance and service related activity/volume goals when necessary
capability.role: This service domain administers the contractual, operational and financial aspects of the relationship with a 3rd party product or service provider. Note that other service domains handle different aspects of broker relations such as relationship management, commissions, billing and payments and operational support
capability.example: A monthly assessment is made of the performance of a broker against service levels and projected business volumes

key_features.name: Establish and maintain broker service terms and conditions
key_features.description: Enables establish and maintain broker service terms and conditions to support this service domain maintains product broker contractual and service level agreements and tracks and confirms compliance and service related activity/volume goals when necessary

key_features.name: Track relationship activity for compliance with contractual limits/goals
key_features.description: Enables track relationship activity for compliance with contractual limits/goals to support this service domain maintains product broker contractual and service level agreements and tracks and confirms compliance and service related activity/volume goals when necessary

key_features.name: Provide confirmation that proposed actions are covered
key_features.description: Enables provide confirmation that proposed actions are covered to support this service domain maintains product broker contractual and service level agreements and tracks and confirms compliance and service related activity/volume goals when necessary
